story.iWant: see a spotlight effect follow my mouse on the project cards
story.soThat: the site feels reactive, intelligent, and engaging
story.tasks: - Logic Implementation (AC: 1, 3) - Visual Implementation (AC: 2, 4, 6) - Optimization (AC: 5) - Integration

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: - 1. Mouse-move event listener integrated into the BentoCard component. - 2. Radial gradient "spotlight" rendered on the card surface. - 3. Spotlight position updates smoothly in real-time as the cursor moves over the card. - 4. Spotlight is only visible during hover and fades out when the mouse leaves the card. - 5. Performance is optimized to prevent lag during rapid mouse movements. - 6. Spotlight color and intensity align with the "AI era" design (e.g., subtle cyan or white glow).
